channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Dynamics 365 (on-premises)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Dynamics 365 (on-premises)

item.title: CVE-2020-1063|2024-08-04T06:25:00.920Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20dynamics%20365%20%28on-premises%29
item.description: A cross site scripting vulnerability exists when Microsoft Dynamics 365 (on-premises) does not properly sanitize a specially crafted web request to an affected Dynamics server, aka 'Microsoft Dynamics 365 (On-Premise) Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability'.

item.title: CVE-2019-1008|2024-08-04T18:06:31.579Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20dynamics%20365%20%28on-premises%29
item.description: A security feature bypass vulnerability exists in Dynamics On Premise, aka 'Microsoft Dynamics On-Premise Security Feature Bypass'.

item.title: CVE-2019-1375|2024-08-04T18:13:30.493Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20dynamics%20365%20%28on-premises%29
item.description: A cross site scripting vulnerability exists when Microsoft Dynamics 365 (on-premises) does not properly sanitize a specially crafted web request to an affected Dynamics server, aka 'Microsoft Dynamics 365 (On-Premise) Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability'.
